Uses of Package
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task

Packages that use com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task
com.continuuity.loom.http Http handlers implementing REST endpoints. 
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks. 
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs. 
com.continuuity.loom.store Persistent stores for admin definable entities, clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes. 
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task used by com.continuuity.loom.http
ClusterJob
          A job contains information related to what needs to be done to perform and coordinate a cluster operation.
ClusterService
          Service for performing operations on clusters.
TaskQueueService
          Manages handing out tasks from task queue, and recording status after the task is done.
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task used by com.continuuity.loom.scheduler
ClusterService
          Service for performing operations on clusters.
ClusterTask
          A task is some action that must be executed on a single node in the cluster.
NodeService
          Service for performing actions on Nodes.
TaskService
          Service for performing operations on ClusterTasks.
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task used by com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task
ClusterJob
          A job contains information related to what needs to be done to perform and coordinate a cluster operation.
ClusterJob.Status
          Job status.
ClusterTask
          A task is some action that must be executed on a single node in the cluster.
ClusterTask.Status
          Task status.
JobId
          Job ids are of the form clusterid-jobid, where ids are numeric.
NodeService
          Service for performing actions on Nodes.
TaskException
          Thrown to indicate that there was a problem creating a cluster job or task.
TaskId
          Task ids are of the format clusterid-jobnum-tasknum, where all ids and numbers are numeric.
TaskService
          Service for performing operations on ClusterTasks.
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task used by com.continuuity.loom.store

          A job contains information related to what needs to be done to perform and coordinate a cluster operation.
ClusterTask
          A task is some action that must be executed on a single node in the cluster.
JobId
          Job ids are of the form clusterid-jobid, where ids are numeric.
TaskException
          Thrown to indicate that there was a problem creating a cluster job or task.
TaskId
          Task ids are of the format clusterid-jobnum-tasknum, where all ids and numbers are numeric.
